text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Palota is a village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1330. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of and covers an area of . It has a population of about 190 people. Palota churches ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District
title: Palota
